definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: The ratio of corrective to preventive maintenance is high relative to best performing NPPs of similar design…
sentences.chinese: 的比例相对而言高于设计相似且实绩最佳的核电厂。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 阐明对核电厂1E级电缆核安全审查的基本要求。

sentences.english: In addition, China has an emergency-response mechanism in place for its nuclear power plants, he said.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在中国拥有的核电厂发生紧急应变机制，他说。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Bush administration decided to encourage new nuclear plants.
sentences.chinese: 因此，布什政府决定鼓励建设新的核电厂。

sentences.english: The research concerns in the reliability model of Chinese nuclear power plant operators.
sentences.chinese: 本工作涉及中国核电厂操纵员可靠性研究的认知模型。

sentences.english: Dong's new Hunterston plant would be built next to a nuclear power station.
sentences.chinese: 东能源公司的亨特斯顿电厂就将建造在核电厂旁边。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, staff at nuclear plants are also taking precautionary measures in advance
sentences.chinese: 同时，沿岸的核电厂也须提前加强预防措施。

sentences.english: One of the fundamental tenets of nuclear power plant design is “Defense in Depth.
sentences.chinese: 设计核电厂有一个基本准则叫“纵深防御”。

sentences.english: Seasonally low flow already forces the occasional shutdown of nuclear plants and other installations.
sentences.chinese: 季节性的低水位已迫使核电厂和其他设施偶尔关闭。

sentences.english: The direct optimization method based on the mixed integer linear programming is proposed to solve the very involved nuclear power plant loading pattern search problem.
sentences.chinese: 本文尝试使用直接优化方法求解核电厂换料优化问题。

sentences.english: This is a report on earthquake monitoring system for Daya Bay Nuclear Power Plant.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对大亚湾核电厂地震检测系统的一份考查报告。

sentences.english: This nuclear power plant which is completely automated and computer-controlled serves the entire city.
sentences.chinese: 这个全自动化和电脑控制的核电厂供应全市的用电。

sentences.english: Iran's still-not-operational nuclear plant is in the southern Bushehr province.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗仍然没有经营的核电厂是在南部布什尔省。

sentences.english: See an NEI table on new nuclear plant status.
sentences.chinese: 见NEI关于新建核电厂状况的列表。

sentences.english: Nuclear power plant – Kalininskaya is the closest to Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 卡里宁斯卡亚是离莫斯科最近的核电厂。

sentences.english: Jingyu, Jilin nuclear power plant, started in 1986.
sentences.chinese: 吉林靖宇核电厂于1986年开始筹建。

definition: fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
